question: You have seen an advertisement in an English newspaper for a job working in the City Museum shop during the holidays. You decide to apply for the job.Write a letter to the director of the Museum. In your letter,introduce yourselfexplain what experience and special skills you haveexplain why you are interested in the job
text: I am writing to the City Museum in reference to an advertisement I saw in The Times last Sunday, February 12 for a tour guide at your museum.

First, My name is Lama, I am in my third year at the college of history.Also, I am living in London about 20 minutes away from the museum and I have my own car.I would like to do a part-time job to upgrade my income as I wish to do  a driving tour in Europe before I go back home next year.

Second, I worked as an assistant teacher last month for 3 weeks, so I applied what I have studied well.Furthermore, I have excellent computer and managerial skills, plus my good presentation skills.In addition, I can speak French, so I can do French guided tours.
Third, I am planning to apply to the ministry of tourism to work as an official tour guide in London after my graduation, so getting the job at your museum will help me a lot and add to my record.
Finally, thanks for your time and effort and I will be waiting for your response.
